# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a borderless button menu style.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Creating a bordeless button menu style

- **init(showsMenuIndicator:)**: Creates a borderless button menu style, specifying whether to show a visual menu indicator.

items.description: Creates a borderless button menu style, specifying whether to show a visual menu indicator.
items.name: init(showsMenuIndicator:)
